name: Computer Page Test
description: As a User I should able to buy computer successfully

children.name: Verify User Should Navigate To Computer Page Successfully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on computers link
Then User navigate to the computer page
And User Verify The Computer text "Computers"
Verify User Should Navigate To Desktops Page Successfully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on computers link
And User click on Desktops link
Then User navigate to the Desktops page
And User Verify The Desktops text "Desktops"
Verify That User Should Build YouOwn Computer And Add Them To Cart Successfully
children.description:
processorramhddossoftware
2.2 GHz Intel Pentium Dual-Core E22002 GB320 GBVista Home [+$50.00]Microsoft Office [+$50.00]
2.5 GHz Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2200 [+$15.00]4GB [+$20.00]400 GB [+$100.00]Vista Premium [+$60.00]Acrobat Reader [+$10.00]
2.5 GHz Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2200 [+$15.00]8GB [+$60.00]320 GBVistaHome [+$50.00]Total Commander [+$5.00]

children.name: Verify That User Should Build YouOwn Computer And Add Them To Cart Successfully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on computers link
And User click on Desktops link
And User click on product name "Build your own computer"
And User select processor "2.2 GHz Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2200"
And User select RAM "2 GB"
And User select HDD "320 GB"
And User select Os "Vista Home [+$50.00]"
And User select software "Microsoft Office [+$50.00]"
And User click on Add to cart button
Then User verify message the "The product has been added to your shopping cart"
Verify That User Should Build YouOwn Computer And Add Them To Cart Successfully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on computers link
And User click on Desktops link
And User click on product name "Build your own computer"
And User select processor "2.5 GHz Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2200 [+$15.00]"
And User select RAM "4GB [+$20.00]"
And User select HDD "400 GB [+$100.00]"
And User select Os "Vista Premium [+$60.00]"
And User select software "Acrobat Reader [+$10.00]"
And User click on Add to cart button
Then User verify message the "The product has been added to your shopping cart"
Verify That User Should Build YouOwn Computer And Add Them To Cart Successfully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on computers link
And User click on Desktops link
And User click on product name "Build your own computer"
And User select processor "2.5 GHz Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2200 [+$15.00]"
And User select RAM "8GB [+$60.00]"
And User select HDD "320 GB"
And User select Os "VistaHome [+$50.00]"
And User select software "Total Commander [+$5.00]"
And User click on Add to cart button
Then User verify message the "The product has been added to your shopping cart"

name: Login Page Test
description: As a User I would Like to Login to the Application successfully

children.name: User Should Navigate To LoginPage SuccessFully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on login link
Then User navigate to the login page
And User Verify The Welcome, Please Sign In! text
Verify The ErrorMessage With InValid Credentials
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on login link
Then User navigate to the login page
And User enter emailAddress "test123@gmail.com"
And User enter Password "ash123"
And User click on Login Button
Then User unable to login with invalid credentials
Verify That User Should Log In SuccessFully With Valid Credentials
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on login link
Then User navigate to the login page
And User enter emailAddress "akakadiya@gmail.com"
And User enter password  "ash123"
And User click on Login Button
Then User Check that LogOut Link is display

logs.details: Verify That User Should LogOut SuccessFully

name: Register Page Test
description: As a User I would Like to Register to the Application successfully

children.name: Verify User Should Navigate To Register Page Successfully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on register link
Then User navigate to the register page
And User Verify The text "Register"
Verify That FirstName LastName Email Password And ConfirmPassword Fields Are Mandatory
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on register link
And User navigate to the register page
And User click on Register Button
Then User check the First name error message "First name is required."
Then User check the Last name error message "Last name is required."
Then User check the  Email error message "Email is required."
Then User check the  Password error message "Password is required."
Then User check the  confirm Password error message "Password is required."
Verify That User Should Create Account Successfully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on register link
And User navigate to the register page
And User click on radio button "female"
And User enter firstname as "Robert"
And User enter lastname as "Jackson"
And User select date for Birthday "18"
And User select month for Birthday "October"
And User select year for Birthday "1990"
And User enter email "roberjackson@gmail.com"
And User enter the password "ash123"
And User enter the confirm password "ash123"
And User click on Register Button
Then User should see successful registration message "Your registration completed"

name: Computer Page Test
description: As a User I should able to buy computer successfully

children.name: Verify User Should Navigate To Computer Page Successfully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on computers link
Then User navigate to the computer page
And User Verify The Computer text "Computers"

name: Login Page Test
description: As a User I would Like to Login to the Application successfully

children.name: User Should Navigate To LoginPage SuccessFully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on login link
Then User navigate to the login page
And User Verify The Welcome, Please Sign In! text

name: Register Page Test
description: As a User I would Like to Register to the Application successfully

children.name: Verify User Should Navigate To Register Page Successfully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on register link
Then User navigate to the register page
And User Verify The text "Register"

name: Computer Page Test
description: As a User I should able to buy computer successfully

children.name: Verify User Should Navigate To Computer Page Successfully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on computers link
Then User navigate to the computer page
And User Verify The Computer text "Computers"
Verify User Should Navigate To Desktops Page Successfully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on computers link
And User click on Desktops link
Then User navigate to the Desktops page
And User Verify The Desktops text "Desktops"

name: Login Page Test
description: As a User I would Like to Login to the Application successfully

children.name: User Should Navigate To LoginPage SuccessFully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on login link
Then User navigate to the login page
And User Verify The Welcome, Please Sign In! text
Verify The ErrorMessage With InValid Credentials
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on login link
Then User navigate to the login page
And User enter emailAddress "test123@gmail.com"
And User enter Password "ash123"
And User click on Login Button
Then User unable to login with invalid credentials

name: Register Page Test
description: As a User I would Like to Register to the Application successfully

children.name: Verify User Should Navigate To Register Page Successfully
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on register link
Then User navigate to the register page
And User Verify The text "Register"
Verify That FirstName LastName Email Password And ConfirmPassword Fields Are Mandatory
Given User is on Homepage
When User click on register link
And User navigate to the register page
And User click on Register Button
Then User check the First name error message "First name is required."
Then User check the Last name error message "Last name is required."
Then User check the  Email error message "Email is required."
Then User check the  Password error message "Password is required."
Then User check the  confirm Password error message "Password is required."
